verses.1: A zingsang ciangin siampi liante le upate in Jesu a thah nading uh a vaihawm uh hi.
verses.2: Sikkhau tawh khihin paipih uh a, tua gam sungteng a uk Pilat mangpa khut sungah a ap uh hi.
verses.3: A lehhek pa Judas in Jesu a si dingin thu a kikhenna a muh ciangin kisikkik ahih manin siampi liante le upate kiangah a ngun peek sawm thumte va paipihkik a,
verses.4: “Mawhna a nei lo mipa a si dingin lehhek kha ka hih manin ka mawh hi,” a va ci hi. Ahi zongin amaute in, “Kote tawh bang kisai nawn ding ahi hiam? Nangma tavuan ahi hi,” a na cih san uh hi.
verses.5: Tua ciangin amah in biakinn sungah a ngun peekte lawnin paikhia a, a mahmah a gui-awk hi.
verses.6: Ahi zongin siampite in tua ngun peekte tawm uh a, “Hih sumte pen mi thah nadingin a kipia sum ahih manin biakinn sumkholna ah koih dingin kilawm lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.7: Tua ahih manin amaute a kikup khit uh ciangin khualmi a site a kivui nadingin beelseek paʼ lo a lei uh hi.
verses.8: Tua ahih manin tu dongin tua lo pen, “Mi Thahna Lo,” a kici hi.
verses.9: Tua ahih manin kamsang Jeremiah in, “Israel mite pawl khat in ama man dingin a seh tua ngun peek sawm thum la uh a,
verses.10: Topa in kei tungah a hong gen mah bangin, beelseek paʼ lo lei nadingin a pia uh hi,” ci-in a gen kholhna a tung ahi hi.
verses.11: Tu-in gam ukpa Pilat mai ah Jesu kidingsak ahih manin amah in, “Nang, Jew miteʼ Kumpipa na hi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin Jesu in, “Nang zong tua mah nong ci hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.12: Ahi zongin siampi liante le upate in mawhsakna thu a gen hangun Jesu in a dawng kei hi.
verses.13: Tua ciangin Pilat in Jesu kiangah, “Amaute in nang a hong mawhsaknate za lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.14: Ahi zongin Jesu in amah a kimawhsaknate kam khat beek dawng het lo ahih manin Pilat in lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
verses.15: Paisan Pawi hun simin Rom gam ukpa in mihonteʼ deih thong kia mi khat a khah a ngeina ahi hi.
verses.16: Tua hun laitakin a gilo mahmah Barabbas a kici mi khat thongkia-in a om hi.
verses.17: Tua ahih manin mihonte hong kikhop ciangin Pilat in amaute kiangah, “Barabbas le Khris a kici Jesu, koi zaw ka khah ding deih na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
verses.18: Bang hang hiam cih leh Jesu a hazat man bekun ama kiangah a paipih ahihna thu teltakin a thei hi.
verses.19: Tua banah, thukhen zumah thusitin a om hunsung mahun, a zi in thu zasak a, “Tu zan ka mang sungin ama hangin nakpi takin gimna thuak ka hih manin, mawhna nei lo tua mipa bangmah cih kha kei in,” a ci hi.
verses.20: Barabbas khahin Jesu a thah nadingin Pilat kiangah a nget nadingun siampi liante le upate in mihonte a hanthawn uh hi.
verses.21: Tua ciangin Rom gam ukpa in mihonte kiangah, “Hih mi nihte, koi pen ka khah ding deih na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot leuleu ciangin amaute in, “Barabbas,” a ci uh hi.
verses.22: Tua ciangin Pilat in, “Tua ahihleh Khris a kici Jesu pen bang cih ding ka hi hiam?” a cih ciangin amaute khempeuh in, “Singlamteh tungah thatsak in,” a ci uh hi.
verses.23: Tua ciangin amah in, “Amah in bang gamtat khialhna nei ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Singlamteh tungah thatsak in,” ci-in a awng ngeingai uh hi.
verses.24: A gengen hangin bangmah phattuamna om loin buaina piang zaw kha ding, ci-in Pilat in a theih ciangin, tui la-in mihonpiʼ muhin a khut sil a, “Hih mipa a sihna thu ah kei ka kihel kei hi. Note in thei ta un,” a ci hi.
verses.25: Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, “Hih mipaʼ sihna hangin gim thuakna, kote a kipanin ka suan ka khakte dongun ka thuak ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
verses.26: Tua ciangin amauteʼ deihna bangin Barabbas khah a, Jesu ahihleh a sat khit ciangin singlamteh tungah thah dingin a pia khia hi.
verses.27: Tua ciangin Pilatʼ galkapte in ama omna kumpi inn ah Jesu paipih uh a, tua lai ah galkap khempeuh a hong kikaikhawm uh hi.
verses.28: Tua lai panin Jesuʼ puan suahkhiatsak uh a, puansan khat a silhsak uh hi.
verses.29: Kumpi lukhu lim dingin ling vialin a lu ah khusak uh a, a khut tak lamah pumpeeng khat a tawisak uh hi. Tua ciangin ama mai ah khukdin uh a, “Jew miteʼ Kumpipa aw,” ci-in zahpihna tawh a hopih uh hi.
verses.30: Tua ciangin cilphih uh a, a pumpeeng tawisak uh la-in a lutang a sat uh hi.
verses.31: Tua bangin a simmawh bawl khit uh ciangin a puansan silhsak uh suah khia leuleu-in ama puan mah silhsakkik uh a, singlamteh tungah thah dingin a paikhiatpih uh hi.
verses.32: Tua bangin a pai laitakun Sairin khuami Simon kici mi khat tawh kituak uh a, amah lammatin Jesuʼ singlamteh a puasak uh hi.
verses.33: Lutang guh a cihnopna Golgotha a kici mun a tun uh ciangin,
verses.34: zatui kha tawh a kihel leenggahzu a dawn dingin a pia uh hi. Ahi zongin Jesu in a ciap khit ciangin a dawn nuam kei hi.
verses.35: Singlamteh tungah Jesu a khai khit uh ciangin a puante kua in a koi ngah ding cih a theih nadingun suang lawnin ai san uh a, a puan teng a hawm uh hi.
verses.36: Tua ciangin amaute tu-in Jesu a en uh hi.
verses.37: Tua ciangin amah a mawhsakna uh, “Hih pa, Jew miteʼ Kumpi Jesu ahi hi,” cihna lai gelhin ama lutang sanah a suang uh hi.
verses.38: Tua ciangin mi that nih, Jesuʼ tak lamah khat, a veilamah khat tawh zong a khai khawm uh hi.
verses.39: Tua ciangin amah a va mu kha mi peuhmah in a lu uh peisanin,
verses.40: “Biakinn susia-in ni thum sungin a lamkik ding pa aw, nang le nang kihon khia in. Pasianʼ Tapa na hih takpi leh singlamteh tung panin hong kum suk in,” ci-in a zahko uh hi.
verses.41: Tua bangmahin siampi liante in Thukham hilh siate le upate tawh zahko-in,
verses.42: “Amah in midangte hon khia thei napi-in a mahmah kihon khia thei lo hi. Amah, Israel miteʼ Kumpi ahi hi. Tu-in singlamteh tung panin hong kum suk leh i um ding hi.
verses.43: Amah in, ‘Kei, Pasianʼ Tapa ka hi hi,’ ci ahih manin, amah in Pasian muanin a nei hi. Pasian in a hot nop leh tu-in hon khia tahen,” a ci uh hi.
verses.44: Tua mah bangin amah tawh a kikhai khawm mi thatte in zong a zahko uh hi.
verses.45: Sun nai sawm le nih hun a kipanin nitak nai thum dong, nai thum sung, tua gam sung khempeuh ah khim a zing hi.
verses.46: Nitak nai thum hun pawl laitakin Jesu nakpi takin kiko a, “Ka Pasian, ka Pasian, bang hangin kei hong nusia na hi hiam?” a cihna ahi, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakthani,” a ci hi.
verses.47: A gei ah a om a pauna a za mite pawl khat in, “Hih mipa in Elijah a sam ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.48: Tua ciangin amaute khat va tai-in tuihupna la-in leenggah-zuhau sungah a diah khit ciangin pumpeeng dawnah henin Jesuʼ hup dingin a tah to hi.
verses.49: Ahi zongin a dangte in, “Khawl dih un; amah a hon khia dingin Elijah hong pai hiam ngak dih ni,” a ci uh hi.
verses.50: Tua ciangin Jesu nakpi takin kiko kikin a si ta hi.
verses.51: Tua laitakin biakinn sung deina puan, a lu panin a taw dongin kikekin phel nih a suak hi. Zin zong liingin suangtumpite kitam hi.
verses.52: Hankhukte zong kihong a, Pasianʼ mi a si sa tampite zong kithokiksak hi.
verses.53: Han khuk panin amaute paikhia uh a, sihna panin Jesu a thawhkik khit ciangin, amaute zong khuapi siangtho sungah hong lut uh a, mi tampi in a mu uh hi.
verses.54: Jesu enin a om galkap bupa le galkapte in zinlinna le a thupiangte a muh uh ciangin lamdang sa mahmah uh a, “Hih pa, Pasianʼ Tapa taktak mah ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.55: Galilee gam panin Jesu hong zui-in amah a huh, a gal et numei tampi zong a om hi.
verses.56: Tua numeite lakah Magdala khuami Mary, James le Josefʼ nu Mary le James le Johanʼ nu ahi, Zebediʼ zi, a kihel uh ahi hi.
verses.57: A nitak ciangin Arimathea khuami, Jesu thu a um, mihau ahi Josef a kici mi khat,
verses.58: Pilat kiangah va pai-in Jesuʼ luang a va ngen hi. Pilat in Josefʼ ngetna bangin Jesuʼ luang a kipiak nadingin thu a pia hi.
verses.59: Josef in zong Jesuʼ luang la-in, dial puan thak tawh a tun khit ciangin,
verses.60: suang a kikhuak thak ahi ama hankhuk sungah a vui hi. Tua ciangin suangtum lianpi khat hualin a han kongvang hucipin a ciah hi.
verses.61: Magdala khuami Mary le a dang Mary zong a hankhuk mai ngatin a tu uh hi.
verses.62: A zing ciang, Sabbath ni-in Pilat kiangah siampi liante le Farisi mite hong pai uh a,
verses.63: “Topa aw, hih mi khem pa in a nuntak lai-in, ‘Ni thum khit ciangin ka hingkik ding hi,’ ci-in a thugenna ka thei uh hi.
verses.64: Tua ahih ciangin ni thum sung a han hoihtakin a kicin nadingin thu pia in. Tua hikeileh a nungzuite in a luanghawm gu khia-in mite kiangah, ‘Sihna panin hingkik khin hi,’ ci kha ding uh ahih manin a mi khem masakna uh sangin a khem nunungna uh hong husia zaw lai kha ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.65: Pilat in amaute kiangah, “Galkapte cingsak unla, a muanhuai theithei dingin na siam bangun hih un,” a ci hi.
verses.66: Tua ahih ciangin amaute pai uh a, a han hukna suang limtakin a ciamteh khit uh ciangin galkapte a cingsak uh hi.
